attributes.additional_details:
Having a gender based school uniform policy can be harmful to young children's mental health. Not only is it sexist and outdated, but also discriminative and damaging to transgender and gender non-conforming children. 
The Welsh Government has already implemented these new statutory guidelines and it is time for the rest of the Nations to follow.
attributes.background: To remove gender labels from school uniform policies across the UK. To implement an inclusive policy that allows children to wear a school uniform that they feel most comfortable in. To require all schools’ uniform policies to list appropriate items of uniform without gender labelling.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578439
